entry.title: 8x10 Photo Frames
entry.content:
He stared at the plain empty frame, and cried.

Photo by Ang√®le Kamp on Unsplash

The photo of his wife used to occupy the space but he couldn‚Äôt bear to look at it now that she was gone.

He was fully aware that one is not supposed to remove photos of loved ones when they passed, but for now the pain was too sharp and piercing.

Amazon.com - upsimples 8x10 Picture Frame Set of 5, Display Pictures 5x7 with Mat or 8 x 10 Without, Wall Gallery Photo Frames, Black

He fell for her hard on the first day she met, her brown hair fell to her shoulders and when she tucked it behind her ears he knew.

She didn‚Äôt know at first. He was a friend and somebody to out with from time to time. Little did she know that he wanted her and to be with her forever.

As time passed, the shared movies became more like dates and although he wasn‚Äôt considered a catch in the looks department he was kind, and kind is what she needed.

Amazon.com - upsimples 11x14 Picture Frame, Display Pictures 8x10 with Mat or 11x14 Without Mat, Wall Hanging Photo Frame, Black, 1 Pack

They had been married 40 years when she died. Cancer, as always. It was slow and horrific as one can imagine but eventually it was just too much and she passed with the winter snow.

The friends and family came and brought lasagna and told him they were sorry for his loss and although they meant well once they were gone the loss was still there and all the well wishes didn‚Äôt make a dent.

Perhaps one day the photo would go back into the frame but for now it was empty, just like his heart.

Shop Photo Frames on Amazon.

entry.title: Girl's Winter Boots
entry.content:
Where we live, winter boots are necessity regardless of age. Well, unless you‚Äôre a teen and then you just wear your Nike‚Äôs year round.

Photo by Helay Hassas on Unsplash

We‚Äôve tried to use some Ugg Boots for the child because they are cute, but nobody really cares what a six-year-old years so this year we cheaped out and got the boots that she picked out.

Jim‚Äôs Pick for Kid‚Äôs Winter Boots

Amazon.com | Lands‚Äô End Waterproof Kids Snow Boots - Insulated Warm Fleece Lined Winter Boots for Toddlers, Girls & Boys - Cotton Candy Pink, 10 Toddler | Boots

These ended up being a pretty good buy at about $40 on sale and we like them.

Pros: Well made, comfortable and easy to put on and off. Waterproof helps too.

Cons: There‚Äôs a chance of premature wear but kids wear through stuff at such a rate it‚Äôs not like these will be family heirlooms.

Rating: 4/3 out of Five Stars.

Buy Now

There‚Äôs probably better boots but these are name brand winter boots for kids that are easy to get into and out of, are waterproof and priced usually about $40.00 on sale.

Shop Girls Winter Boots on Amazon

entry.title: Men's Handkerchief
entry.content:
I really don‚Äôt know why one would need a handkerchief unless it was to tuck in a breast pocket on a men‚Äôs suit.

Photo by 3d illustrations on Unsplash

Jim‚Äôs Pick for Handkerchiefs:

Scotamalone Men‚Äôs Handkerchiefs 100% Soft Cotton White Hankie Hankerchieves

Pros: Soft, good quality and washability

Cons: They wrinkle easily and could be considered too thin.

Rating: 4.6 stars

Buy Now on Amazon

It seems pretty gross to me to have to use a handkerchief in 2025 when you have a more palatable option of facial tissues because somehow the idea of walking around with a pocket full of boogers isn‚Äôt my idea of a good time.

I wonder if there‚Äôs a handkerchief reddit group - I‚Äôm not going to look - where you can discuss the pros and cons of booger retrieval with handkerchief vs tissues

I would guess there would be.

Shop Men‚Äôs Hankies on Amazon

entry.title: Kids Winter Hats
entry.content:
Photo by Lucas van Oort on Unsplash

This photo pretty much sums up the status of winter hats in our house: lost

That‚Äôs why we don‚Äôt spend a lot of money on winter hats for the kiddo because what‚Äôs the point? I usually just grab the cheapest winter hat I can find and call it a day.

Jim‚Äôs Pick for Winter Hats

Here‚Äôs a four pack of winter hats for about twelve bucks that would do the trick:

DEBAIY 3Pack Beanies Hats Knitted Caps for Men & Women & Teen (Coffee Brown/Cream White/Beige) at Amazon Men‚Äôs Clothing store

Pros: Warm in cold weather, comfortable and soft

Cons: Could be thicker in weight

Rating 4.5 stars

Buy Now on Amazon

There is absolutely no sense in buying anything greater unless the conditions are really cold and you then you should just keep the kiddos inside anyway and have them watch movies on their tablet

Shop Kids Winter Hats on Amazon

entry.title: Winter Mittens for Kids
entry.content:
Photo by Eli Pluma on Unsplash

I would be rich if I didn‚Äôt have to buy mittens for the child. This, and winter hats disappear at an alarming rate.

With this knowledge I suggest that you buy the cheapest winter mittens or gloves you can find.

Jim‚Äôs Pick

Amazon.com: 3 Pairs Kids Thicken Snow Mitten Winter Gloves Waterproof Warm Ski Mitten Toddler Boys Girls (Fluorescent Green, Pink, Purple,5-10 Years): Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

I like these because they‚Äôre cheap enough and you get 3 pairs for about 5 bucks which isn‚Äôt bad at all for kids mittens. You could buy more expensive mittens but why would you when they either get lost or eaten by the Dog?

You could go the route of clips or strings to keep the mittens somehow attatched to the child, but I found they didn‚Äôt really work that well and they still got lost.

Amazon.com : kids mittens string

entry.title: Facial Tissue
entry.content:
Don‚Äôt call them Kleenex.

Photo by Diana Polekhina on Unsplash

Jim‚Äôs Pick for Facial Tissues

Amazon Basics Facial Tissue

It‚Äôs cold and flu season here and that means the tissue consumption goes up because kids and boogers reign supreme here.

These particular tissues are cheap enough at little over one cent per sheet, which isn‚Äôt too bad considering that some days this one cent item can seem worth a whole lot more.

I don‚Äôt think I could ever get used to using a [[2025-12-04-hankerchief.md | hankerchief]] because then you‚Äôre walking [[f]] with boogers in your pocket and that‚Äôs just gross. ew.

Amazon Facial Tissue Reviews

These particular facial tissues get a pretty good review at 4.3 out of five:

Customers find these facial tissues work well as an everyday product, with good absorbency and value for money. The quality is comparable to Kleenex, and customers appreciate their absorbent 2-ply construction. The softness receives mixed feedback, with some finding them reasonably soft while others describe them as too rough. Durability and thickness are also mixed aspects, with some finding them strong and well-made while others report they tear easily and become thinner over time. The scratchiness is a concern, with customers noting they are rough on the nose.

Shop Facial Tissues on Amazon

entry.title: Dish Detergent
entry.content:
Dish Soap. I used to just buy whatever was on sale and not think about it, but then I got married and for a while we are using Mrs.Meyers dishsoap but that shit got expensive in a hurry once we had a kid.

Photo by Brooke Balentine on Unsplash

So, now we just buy the cheapest dish detergent we can find and lately it‚Äôs been this one:

Jim‚Äôs Pick for Dish Detergent

Amazon.com: Dawn Platinum Powerwash Dish Spray, Dish Soap Liquid, Fresh Scent Bundle

Sure, there‚Äôs other more bougie brands that talk about the craft of doing dishes but our job is to get them clean, dry and then use them again hours later usually.

Dawn Platinum Dish Detergent Review

Pros: Cuts through grease easy and the spray bottle is cool

Cons: The strong smell can be off-putting to some

Rating: 4.8 stars

Add to Cart

For the price, this might just very well be the best soap you can buy for cleaning your dishes - unless, you don‚Äôt have kids - then you can use the fancy soap.

Shop Dish Detergent on Amazon

entry.content:
Photo by Jessica Lewis ü¶ã thepaintedsquare on Unsplash

I‚Äôm not a pen snob so maybe I‚Äôm the wrong person to give advice for pen replacements, but I have heard that getting into pens can get crazy expensive.

Jim‚Äôs Pick

Amazon.com : Black Pen Holder Cup for Desk, Black Wire Mesh Pencil Cup Holder for Desk Office Pen Organizer : Office Products

Cheap pens are great because, well - they‚Äôre cheap and if you lose them it‚Äôs no big deal.

I know there‚Äôs reddit groups and clubs all about pens and I‚Äôm not that guy as I don‚Äôt really have much use for a pen and theres always a pen or two in my [[Glass Pen Holder]] so I haven‚Äôt had to buy a pen in a long time so these would do in a pinch.

The only other writing tools I may need would be some [[Pencils]] and maybe [[Sharpie]] or two and I am good to go.

entry.title: Steel Wool
entry.content:
I only remember using steel wool for cleaning the rust off my bike tires and I doubt I would use it to clean my pots and pan set for daily use as there are more gentle [[2025-12-02-kitchen-sponge.md|ways]] to clean your dishes now.

Photo by yasin hemmati on Unsplash

Jim‚Äôs Pick

Amazon.com: Scotch-Brite Stainless Steel Scrubbers, Scouring Pads for Cleaning Tough Baked-On Messes, Metal Scrubbers for Cleaning Dishes, 3 Scrub Pads : Health & Household

I like these over tradition steel wool pads because they don‚Äôt have that messy soap built into them already and it‚Äôs so, so messy and I have yet to determine if it actually makes a difference so I have to pick the above as my recommendation and just get a bit of your own dish soap to use with these pads and I bet you‚Äôre rocking it just as well than those others.

Shop Steel Wool Pads on Amazon

entry.title: Pots and Pan Set
entry.content:
I really don‚Äôt care much about pots and pans. I mean, they work and that‚Äôs about it.

Photo by Cooker King on Unsplash

Actually, scratch that. Pots and pans do matter because if you eat at home (you should) then you will spend a lot of time cooking and liek th mechanics that pay a lot of money for good tools, every home should have a good pot and pan set.

Jim‚Äôs Pick

Amazon.com: Amazon Basics Non Stick Kitchen Cookware 8-Piece Set, Non-Induction, Includes Pots and Pans, Black: Home & Kitchen

Pros: Even heat distribution and easy to clean

Cons: Not the most durable

Rating 4.6 out of five

Buy Now On Amazon

You don‚Äôt have to spend a lot of money on a pot and pan set, although you can, it‚Äôs optional and if you start with a good starter set it will let you figure out what pots and pans you use the most so when the next time you need a new pot and pan set you have a better day about your needs.

Shop Pots and Pans on Amazon

entry.title: Blue Marlboro Coffee Cup Set
entry.content:
Photo by Asher Ward on Unsplash

We‚Äôre not smokers so obviously these did not get bought new or won as a prize, but I think we found these at a garage sale while looking for something completely different.

Jim‚Äôs Pick for Blue Coffee Mugs

Amazon.com: Grip 12oz Enamel Coffee Mug - Impact Resistant - Dishwasher Safe Enamel Finish - Great for Campsite, Tailgates, Picnics, BBQs (Blue) : Home & Kitchen

This is a really nice mug. It holds a good amount of coffee or whatever hot drink you want to have. I sometimes am able to get a latte in this mug without issue.

This blue coffee mug had a good hand feel in the hand and seems to work well for me for using every day. They are sturdy and are dishwasher safe which is nice too because nobody wants to wash dishes by hand with a [[2025-12-02-kitchen-sponge.md|kitchen sponge]] because that‚Äôs no fun.

Here‚Äôs a few other blue coffee mugs to consider:

entry.title: These are the Best Dish Cloths
entry.content:
I used to just use the good old j-cloths that I had been using since oh, the eighties at least.

Photo by Brooke Lark on Unsplash

But now, I have better. Because there‚Äôs now some cloths that work better than the old dish washing cloths of yesterday.

The problem with the older dish washing cloths of yesterday is that they smelled a lot if you didn‚Äôt stay on top of them. The musty smell is one smell I could never get used to, and besides - who wants to wash dishes with an older musty dish cloth that‚Äôs a germ factory in fabric farm.

Jim‚Äôs Pick

I really like these because they‚Äôre sturdy but no too big so you‚Äôre not tied up in the cloth while you‚Äôre trying to get some dishes washed

Amazon.com: Kitinjoy 100% Cotton Kitchen Dish Cloths, 6 Pack Waffle Weave Ultra Soft Absorbent Dish Towels for Drying Dishes Quick Drying Kitchen Towels Dish Rags, 12 X 12 Inches, Dark Grey : Home & Kitchen

these are great for washing my travel mug for one example as they are very absorbant to get all the old coffee out and have it rinsed and ready for next time.

Here‚Äôs a few other dish cloths I like:

Amazon.com: VMKBL 10 Pcs New Upgraded 3 Layers Non Scratch Wire Dishcloth, Multipurpose Wire Dishwashing Rags, Wet & Dry for Cookware, Sinks, Dishes, Stoves & Fireplaces (7.87 x 7.87-10pcs) : Health & Household

entry.title: Men's Levi Jeans
entry.content:
Jeans are the quintessential wardrobe item for myself. I have tried to wear many other pants over the years and always come back to jeans.

Jim‚Äôs pick for Mens Levi‚Äôs Jeans Levi‚Äôs Men‚Äôs 511 Slim Fit Jeans

Photo by Mnz on Unsplash

Now, especially because now they‚Äôre not just plain denim but also some kind of space age stretchy material for those of us with variable waistlines.

I stick to the basic colors and for style, I like the slim fit for my once slim fit, but if I keep eating pie I might have to graduate to relaxed

I suggest waiting for them to go on sale as they tend to frequently because who wants to pay full price for a pair of jeans?

entry.title: Travel Mug.md
entry.content:
Photo by Julian Hochgesang on Unsplash You would think with all this technology available to is we would be able to design a coffee mug that doesn‚Äôt spill. I didn‚Äôt know I was a coffee cup snob until I was constantly spilling on myself and so I went and did some reading and found that the Contigo cups were pretty good.

I like the fact that you can flip a tab and the opening will close quickly as you don‚Äôt have to worry about spilling. I would and definitely have recommend this coffee travel mug.

entry.title: Men's Wallets
entry.content:
Oh, wallets. I‚Äôve had a few in my lifetime but they‚Äôve never seemed to be the one. I had a velcro wallet one once and that was great until you opened it and realized that people were staring.

[!Jim‚Äôs Pick] Jim‚Äôs Pick - This is the wallet I would buy if I had to do it all over again Amazon.com: Vaultskin MOORGATE Slim Card Holder ‚Äì Minimalist Leather Wallet with RFID Blocking, Front Pocket Credit Card Case for Men & Women (Royal Blue) : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

I always, always wore my wallet that had every receipt in it from 1985 becausse, you never know when you might need it again.

But then I found out about minimalist wallet. I‚Äôm no minimalist as [[We Have That At Home!| this site]] will show over time but man it‚Äôs nice to get this thing into your front pocket instead of the back because it‚Äôs a lot easier on the back and you don‚Äôt have take your wallet out after driving for 40 minutes because you can‚Äôt feel your ass anymore.

If my pick doesn‚Äôt do it for you there‚Äôs a few other wallets that might work and are still minimal:

Amazon.com: The Ridge Wallet - Slim Minimalist Compact Wallet and Card Holder, | RFID Protected Front Pocket Wallets | Integrated Cash Strap | Forest Green : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

Amazon.com: ZALVEX Wallet for Men, Mens Minimalist Wallet 9-13 Cards, Slim Compact Wallet with Money Clip & ID Window, RFID Blocking Smart Pop Up Card Wallet, Metal Aluminum Credit Card Holder Bifold Wallet : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

entry.title: Mens Puffer Coat.md
entry.content:
I really don‚Äôt care much for what winter coat I have as my current lifestyle is to go from house to car most days and maybe have to stand around and wait for the school bus with my daughter in the am.

I have the Amazon essentials puffer jacket and one of the better features of this jacket is that it is cheap and is often on sale for $20 or so which in 2025 is a great price for a jacket of any kind.

[!NOTE] Jim‚Äôs Pick for a lightweight puffer jacket Amazon.com: Amazon Essentials Men‚Äôs Packable Lightweight Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket (Available in Big & Tall), Navy, Large : Sports & Outdoors

There‚Äôs other jackets you could buy and some are from brands you recognize and then some are from brands you don‚Äôt but they are all the same fairly well so just pick one. I like the Amazon one I list above, but if that‚Äôs not your bag, then there‚Äôs others to choose from.

Shop Men‚Äôs Lightweight Puffer Jackets

entry.title: Kid's Skechers Shoes
entry.content:
Jim‚Äôs Pick

Skechers Girls Eternal Heart Lights

But, the kiddo loves them more than her sea monkeys so there‚Äôs that.

I must warn you that if you‚Äôre buying these for your child that they will be clean for all of about 7 seconds. But the good news is that they seem to be washable for the most part and the lights still work after.

Maybe I got lucky with the washing, I dunno but you only get a few month out of these anyway and you can usually find them on sale for about $25 so whatever.

These are great shoes because the child can put them on themselves due to the elastic laces and velcro. I recommend these.

There are other designs and colors if you don‚Äôt like my pick, but the skechers are a good brand name sneaker for little growing feet.

Shop Skechers Shoes for Girls on Amazon

entry.content:
We fed the sea monkeys today and it was okay for us and a little fun and I can‚Äôt believe that the sea monkeys are actually growing. I thought she was going to jump out of her shoes when she saw the first monkey swimming in the water.

These are a fun little thing and seem to be age appropriate too.

entry.title: Trivets for the Table
entry.content:
I like Trivets, I do.

I didn‚Äôt know what a trivet was until my late 40‚Äôs but now we have them everywhere and they are used almost every day.

What‚Äôs a trivet? It‚Äôs a thing that allows you to put something hot from the stove and not burn the thing underneath. We use it to serve family style sometimes when we are [[2025-12-03-glass-pen-holder.md| glass pen holder]] lazy.

Jim‚Äôs Pick

I‚Äôm not that fussy about trivets and so I Trivets just get some cork trivets like these and call it a day:

Amazon.com: Cork Trivets for Hot Dishes, Pots and Pans, Pot Holders for Kitchen, 8 Inches 4 Pack Hot Pads, Thick Heat Resistant Mats Protect Countertop, Coaster Trivet Home Essentials, Rustic Farmhouse Decor: Home & Kitchen

Amazon.com: Cork Trivet, 4 Pack High Density Thick Cork Coasters Set for Hot Dishes, 7.5 Inch Heat Resistant Multifunctional, Hot Pads for Kitchen, Table, Countertops: Home & Kitchen

entry.title: Men's Hoodies
entry.content:
This is my favorite hoodie

I have fallen when it comes to fashion. At one time it was all about the look and now comfort trumps all and I live in a hoodie almost all the time now.

Photo by Mediamodifier on Unsplash

Jim‚Äôs Pick

If I had to pick one hoodie, it would be this one because, I would like to have no logo at all but I am the odd one and this is the best it gets then it‚Äôs this one:

adidas Men‚Äôs Essentials Fleece Hoodie, Shadow Brown, Small at Amazon Men‚Äôs Clothing store

All you really need is a clean hoodie a white t-shirt underneath and some comfortable shoes and you‚Äôre ready to go.

I‚Äôm kind of allergic to logos, but the Adidas stuff is well made for the most part so that‚Äôs why I would buy this one over others, but there‚Äôs a few other options to consider when buying the best hooded sweatshirt for your wardrobe

Also worth considering:

Hanes Men‚Äôs Full-Zip Eco-Smart Hoodie, Navy, Large at Amazon Men‚Äôs Clothing store
